Installation¶

Preliminary steps¶

The following steps are required for any OS.

Download pyqtgraphs¶

Download MARSIS/SHARAD viewer¶

Enable backports repository¶

Install QGIS and dependencies¶

Install MARSIS/SHARAD plugin¶

Install MARSIS/SHARAD plugin¶

Enable required repositories¶
